attributes.action: Highlight the Uk offshore workforce being denied the right to strike
attributes.additional_details:
Blacklisting of union members and elected stewards.
Use of cheaper foreign labour
Blatent abuse of workplace agreements with attacks on terms and conditions
attributes.background:
Since the early 1990s the Uk offshore workforce has been denied the right to organise and/or take industrial action.
Unions work in partnership with the employers and fail to represent their members and their wishes

rejection.details: UK offshore workers have the same right to strike as other UK workers. We are therefore not sure what action you would like the UK Government to take.
